summary.para: Requests a lock on a shared resource.

param.name: dwTimeout
param.para: The time interval after which the attempted lock operation fails.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

summary.para: Releases a lock on a shared resource.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

summary.para: Provides a semaphore that can be used to provide temporarily exclusive access to a shared resource such as a file.
